-----error----- ---error name Your name can not be empty! The name must be 5 characters or more in length! The name can not contain numbers or special characters! ---error phone number Your phone number can not be empty! The phone number must be 9 numbers or more in length! The phone number can not contain special characters (except for the +) or spaces! ---error birthday Your birthday can not be empty! You must be 12 years or older to use our services! ---error username Your username can not be empty! The username must be 5 characters or more in length! The username can not contain special characters or spaces! This username already exists! ---error password Your password can not be empty! The password must be 6 characters or more in length! The password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter! The password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter! The password must contain at least 1 number! The password must contain at least 1 special character! The password can not contain spaces! ---error confirm password Your confirm password can not be empty! The confirm password does not match the password! ---error agree You must agree to the terms of use! ---error sign in Sign in failed! The username or password is wrong!
------successful---------- ---successful sign up Sign up successful! Thank you for using our service! ---successful sign in Sign in successful! Have a nice day! ^^
